ibis.ipl.registry.central.server

Class CentralRegistryService

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • ibis.ipl.registry.central.server.CentralRegistryService
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    RegistryServiceInterface, Service, java.lang.Runnable

    public final class CentralRegistryService
extends java.lang.Thread
implements Service, RegistryServiceInterface
    Server for the centralized registry implementation.
